lead_paragraph: The Fall’s 28th album is a useful reminder that the band led by Mark E. Smith has been worth paying attention to for a long, long time.
snippet: The Fall’s 28th album is a useful reminder that the band led by Mark E. Smith has been worth paying attention to for a long, long time.

headline.main: Mr. Smith Shows His Staying Power
headline.seo: Mark E. Smith Shows His Staying Power
headline.print_headline: Mr. Smith Shows His Staying Power
